definitions: a person who hunts solely to achieve a kill, rather than as a sport

examples.text: pothunters who shot for the table were despised

shortDefinitions: person who hunts solely to achieve kill

definitions: a person who takes part in a contest merely for the sake of the prize.
shortDefinitions: person who takes part in contest merely for sake of prize

definitions: a person who seeks objects of archaeological interest or value for personal use or benefit, especially by unscientific or illicit methods.
shortDefinitions: person who digs for objects of archaeological interest
